title: Recent Bug
body:
Here's a glitch I've had about a handful of times in the last week now with different champions:

- Instead of the usual click animation, my right clicks were producing a red 'target' animation and wouldn't allow me to move, only target enemy units.
- My abilities, mapped to ZXCV, couldn't be used (I later realised that it had reverted back to QWER by itself) and I was unable to click on most buttons in-game. This meant that I couldn't ping, add points to my abilities, open settings etc etc. I was also unable to purchase from the shop.
- Once a unit was targeted, I was unable to move my character until another nearby unit had been targeted, meaning that if I was under a turret and no enemy units were nearby, I couldn't move from under the turret.

Anyone else had this issue too?

replies.body: Seems like you have the Shift key held down. Did you accidentally enable Sticky Keys or an equivalent?
